Question: VIVAINNOVATION Co. , Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
VIVAINNOVATION Co. , Ltd.

DreameBot X30 Ultra smart vacuum

- New add-on blade attachment to prevent tangles
- New attachment for the bottom of the auto-empty docking station
- Squeegees to clean the bottom of the docking station

ExoBrew home beer brewer

- All-in-one brewer for mess-free home brewing
- App-guided beer brewing process
- Ready-to-go kit or custom flavor options

Withings BeamO home checkup

- Multiple sensors for stethoscope, SpO2 sensor, ECG, and thermometer
- Results displayed on BeamO's colorful LCD display
- Results uploaded via Wi-Fi to the company's app

Govee smart lights

- Matter-enabled neon light strip with multiple addressable zones
- Improved AI sync box with game-reactive lighting effects
- Second-generation neon light strip made of flexible material

Ugreen NAS

- Range of network-attached storage devices with various ports
- Powered by Intel processors and designed for speed
- Portable NAS with built-in Wi-Fi and docking station functionality

Mui Board Gen 2 Matter controller

- Matter-certified wooden smart controller
- Set various scenes or control Matter devices in the home
- Display different information on smart home and weather

J5create Thunderbolt 5 dock

- Thunderbolt 5 dock with various ports including audio, USB-A, and Ethernet
- Front-facing audio output and USB-A port
- Compact and sleek design

Xgimi IMAX 4K projector

- 4K smart projector with automatic positioning
- IMAX-enhanced for exceptional picture quality
- Supports Apple AirPlay and multiple ports

Targus Ergo Flip Mouse

- Award-winning mouse with magnetic top for left or right-handed use
- Ergonomic design with seamless transition between left and right-handed use
Summary_cn:
VIVAINNOVATION Co. , Ltd.

DreameBot X30 Ultra智能吸尘器

- 新增刀片附件以防止缠绕
- 用于自动排空对接站底部的新附件
- 用于清理对接站底部的蛇皮橡胶

ExoBrew家用啤酒酿造机

- 一体式酿造机，无尘家庭酿造
- 应用引导式酿造过程
- 提供即用套装或定制口味选项

Withings BeamO家庭健康检查

- 多个传感器，可用作听诊器、SpO2传感器、心电图和体温计
- 结果显示在BeamO的彩色液晶显示屏上
- 通过Wi-Fi上传结果至公司的应用程序

Govee智能灯

- 支持Matter的霓虹灯带，具有多个可寻址区域
- 改进的人工智能同步盒，具有游戏反应式灯光效果
- 第二代柔性材料制成的霓虹灯带

Ugreen NAS

- 多种端口的网络附加存储设备
- 由英特尔处理器供电，速度设计优越
- 便携式NAS，具有内置Wi-Fi和对接站功能

Mui Board Gen 2 Matter控制器

- 支持Matter的木制智能控制器
- 设定各种场景或控制家中的Matter设备
- 在智能家居和天气上显示不同的信息

J5create Thunderbolt 5对接站

- Thunderbolt 5对接站，包括音频、USB-A和以太网等多个端口
- 前置音频输出和USB-A端口
- 紧凑而时尚的设计

Xgimi IMAX 4K投影仪

- 具备自动定位的4K智能投影仪
- IMAX增强版，提供卓越的画质
- 支持Apple AirPlay和多个端口

Targus Ergo Flip鼠标

- 获奖鼠标，带有磁性顶部，可供左右手使用
- 符合人体工学设计，左右手使用过渡无缝
